reviews.review_msg: A lot of people need to understand that this class is an intro class which means there is going to be a lot of material. Depending on how you study and how often you study is 100% going to affect your mark. The material itself isn't hard, there is just a lot. Mike's lectures go by pretty quickly with his enthusiasm and dad jokes.
screwed the whole class by giving ridiculous questions on midterm...

One of the most content dense course I've ever taken. 5 question prelab quiz weekly that makes you read 50 pages of the lab manual, 2-3 hour long lectures weekly, and labs that are relatively easy. Midterms&finals are the hardest thing. Don't take this course unless you have to! Avoid this course at all costs. You have to dedicate 5-9 hours a week.

The prof is really good at explaining and makes the lecture interesting, there are 2 midterms and finals and there is also mandatory library work. The midterms were difficult and the course material is a lot, so study daily or weekly or else there will be too much material for you to study by the time the exam is close.
